mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_MESSAGE_CATALOG ( id, code, lastUpdateDate, name, vcid, valid, createDate, modifyAble, parentId, remark, messageType ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{name}, #{vcid}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{modifyAble}, #{parentId}, #{remark}, #{messageType} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MSG_MESSAGE_CATALOG
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code}
